tasks.description: Create migration to add phone_number column as nullable to the users table in migrations/001-add-phone-number-nullable.sql
Create migration to backfill existing rows with a default phone_number value in migrations/002-backfill-phone-number.sql
Create migration to enforce NOT NULL constraint on phone_number column after backfill is complete in migrations/003-enforce-phone-number-not-null.sql
Update User model in src/models/user.ts to include the phone_number field
Add tests for the new phone_number field in test/models/user.test.ts to verify schema behavior
